MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH43 postcode area of Walkerburn. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30pm to continue to investigate an underground cable fault at Kirna House and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.02pm on Tuesday 27th October 2020.
